publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5405 Andrew Welsh on behalf of the Finance Committee: 7th Report 2009 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on Scrutiny of the Draft Budget 2010-11â€”That the Parliament notes the 7th Report 2009 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on the scrutiny of the Draft Budget 2010-11 (SP Paper 349) and refers the report and its recommendations to the Scottish Government for consideration. Supported by: Tom McCabe*
